com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.sensordemo

Class SensorDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.DBConnector
      • com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.sensordemo.SensorDemo

  • public final class SensorDemo
extends DBConnector
    Draw sensor monitor data coming from any number of PCs. Data includes CPU usage, memory usage, temperature, acceleration, disk and network I/O and battery levels. This class will create a window which draws chart representations of the data, refreshing every three seconds.
    Author:
    Samir Talwar - stalwar@uk.ibm.com

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorDemo

        public SensorDemo(java.lang.String[] args)
           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Initializes the demo by connecting to the database using the arguments provided.
        Parameters:
        args - An array containing, in order, the JDBC URL, username, and password.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the Derby client driver class cannot be found.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if an interrupt occurs while sleeping between connection attempts.
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a new SensorDemo and begins drawing graphs.
        Parameters:
        args - The program arguments.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.

      • load

        public void load()
        Reads in the configuration file if there is one, then creates the graphs using the GraphLoader. Handles any custom settings.

      • createWindow

        public void createWindow()
        Creates a window and adds each diagram to it, then initialises the diagrams.

      • resizeDiagrams

        public void resizeDiagrams(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                           int rows,
                           int columns)
        Resizes the diagrams to fit perfectly within the window.
        Parameters:
        frame - The window.
        rows - The number of rows.
        columns - The number of columns.

      • updateDiagrams

        public void updateDiagrams()
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Repeatedly loops through the diagrams and updates them, pausing between each one.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.
